Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I was a little worried there for a while,
but everyone arrived safely. What a relief!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now Agus—a real gourmet chef—is going
to teach me how to make a <clr:0000>meat and rice
bowl<clr:ffff>! I'm so excited!
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The princess's famed meat and rice bowl!<sp:5:1:0>
You need to use raw meat in the dish and
not tinker with the recipe. That's key.
I'm planning on trying <clr:0000>all different kinds
of raw meat <clr:ffff>with the recipe, just to really
get a feel for it.
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, forgive me, dear customer. I'm afraid
I'm not going to be of much assistance
right now.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>My mind and heart are occupied with
learning the <clr:0000>meat and rice bowl<clr:ffff> recipe
from Agus, the gourmet chef.
So if you need something from the stable,
please ask at the counter.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I was worried things were getting a little
dicey there, but to my relief, everyone
arrived safe and sound.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>As soon as dawn peeks over the horizon,
I'll be learning how to make the <clr:0000>meat and
rice bowl <clr:ffff>from Agus, a real gourmet chef!
I just can't wait for daybreak!
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, I'm very sorry about this,<sp:5:1:0> but if you
need something from the stable, would
you mind asking at the counter?
Once this night is over, I'm going to learn
the recipe for a <clr:0000>meat and rice bowl<clr:ffff> from
the renowned gourmet chef Agus!
Which means I need to use this time to
finish my stable work before then.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I was starting to worry for a while there,
but everyone arrived safely!

In fact, I was just asking Agus about the
<clr:0000>meat and rice bowl recipe<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Apologies, but if you need something,
please ask at the counter.

Once dawn breaks, the renowned gourmet
chef Agus is going to teach me the recipe
for <clr:0000>meat and rice bowls<clr:ffff>!
Which means I need to use this time to
finish my stable work before then.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The key is to use raw meat in the dish and
not stray from the recipe. You mustn't get
that wrong!
Clearly,<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>Princess Zelda <clr:ffff>is just as capable
a chef as she is a princess, adventurer,
and all-around delight!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Imagine if we could get her to teach a
cooking class at our stable someday!
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, my apologies,<sp:5:1:0> but if you need
something from the stable, please
ask at the counter.
I'm currently trying to learn the <clr:0000>meat and
rice bowl <clr:ffff>recipe from the renowned
gourmet chef Agus.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>It seems that he learned the recipe from
Princess Zelda herself!
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm going to be learning how to make a
<clr:0000>meat and rice bowl <clr:ffff>from the gourmet
chef Agus!
So if you need something from the stable,
would you mind asking at the counter?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>Do forgive me, but I need to attend to
other customers at the moment.

So if you need to use the stable, please
speak to the gentleman at the counter.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm so excited for their arrival that I can't
even focus on my stable work!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>S-sir,<sp:5:0:0> if you stand there, you'll be
soaked to the bone! Or, worse still,
struck by lightning!
Please, come in and take shelter under
our roof!
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>There's a group of gourmets who frequent
our stable, and they always teach me new
recipes to cook!
And the recipe for our next session is...<sp:5:0:0>
a dish devised by Princess Zelda herself!

I'm so excited,<sp:5:0:0> I can't even sit still!
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>What recipe will I learn this time, you ask?
Why, one devised by none other than
Princess Zelda herself!
I'm just so,<sp:5:0:0> so excited that I can't sit still!
Talk_0007: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Humming>Recipe, recipe, recipe... Oh, I can't wait!
Talk_0010: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_00>Ah, excuse me, I was lost in thought...
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>What recipe are they going to teach me
this time?<sp:5:1:0> My mouth is watering just
thinking about it!
